# Max Int8

> Maximum signed 8-bit integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var INT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/int8/max' );
```

#### INT8_MAX

Maximum 8-bit signed integer.

```javascript
var bool = ( INT8_MAX === 127 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```javascript
var INT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/int8/max' );

console.log( INT8_MAX );
// => 127
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
